caption: Andrea Boscoli (Italian, 1550–1607), after Polidoro Caldara, called Polidoro da Caravaggio (Italian, 1499 - 1543), formerly attributed to Polidoro Caldara, called Polidoro da Caravaggio (Italian, 1499 - 1543), Portion of a frieze of figures bearing offerings, copied from a facade fresco by Polidoro da Caravaggio on the Palazzo Milesi, Rome. Pen and brown ink and brush and brown wash; 11.4 x 39.1 cm. Bequest of Dan Fellows Platt, Class of 1895 (x1948-666)
